name: Tyltius
description:
A short score attack shooter for the Gunner Parade '22 Winter League 

Z (O button) to fire a wide shot 

X (X button) to fire a narrow damaging focus shot that slows your ship

Let ships of the same color pass you to build combos. The higher the combo the harder the game

Uses Mot's Instant3D for the 3d projection. 

https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=37982

 

Still in development but playable.

To be added soon:

Dedicated 2d and 3d modes (currently you start in 2d and switch to 3d after a 30x combo)

Reduced bomb drops

Fixing a score issue where you can wrap around after passing pico 8's max integer value
